body.p:
Executive Department
Frankfort May 2 1861
To B. J. Adams
Louisville --
Cashier Branch Southern Bank at Louisville Pay to A. O. Brannin and B. J. Admas on order amount of funds to credit of Commonwealth in your Branch -- to be used in arming the state --
